name: Grinning Face
meaning: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and curved eyes. Often conveys general happiness and good-natured amusement.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
meaning: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard.

name: Red Heart
meaning: A classic red heart emoji, used for expressions of love.
